THE VOTES FOR THE LAB LABOO AWARD ARE OPEN!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off” transparent_background=”off” background_color=”#ffffff” allow_player_pause=”off” inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” padding_mobile=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” make_equal=”off” use_custom_gutter=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” text_font=”Arial||||”]

The Lab Laboo Innovator Award recognizes a digital project holder whose innovation is particularly original and inspiring. The rewarded digital innovation must contribute to the achievment of one or more of the 3Zeros by exploiteing synergies between actors from different sectors.

After the call for applications in june/july, we have selected in august up to 40 nominates. From September 4 to 30, the public is invited to support its favorite projects by distributing its votes on the online platform.

Qwick reminder concerning the voting rules: each participant has 5 votes, a maximum of 2 votes can be given for the same project

 

Last year, Gaël Musquet has won the 2016 lab Labbo Innovator Award with its project CaribeWave and he has be given the possibility to give more visibility to his porject at the World Forum 2016. This year we would like to renew the experience, solutions do exist and we propose you to helps us to valorise them.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”http://prix-lablaboo.convergences.org/en/#filters” url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Vote online!” button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#cb276b” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
